name: beechill road sunset yarn
description:
a beautiful single to celebrate an early spring sunset I photographed on Beechill Road in Belfast. 

fibers including merino, shetland and angelina were handdyed by me, then carded together to create a completely and utterly unique batt. I then spun it into a lush single on my louet wheel.

the colours zing...a combination of hot oranges and deep teals, with enough for a small hat, a pair of fingerless gloves or a scarfette.

103m/113yards 70g/2.5oz

email me at maisiehandspun@live.ie for more details.

name: blowing rainbows kool aid multi CUSTOM yarn
description:
this yarn is mostly 100% virgin super soft merino wool fiber, hand dyed by me with Kool Aid (yes!), with a little shetland acid-dyed green thrown in for good measure, then spun and plyed into a fab multi coloured yarn.

this is a custom listing. price applies to 50m of finished plyed yarn. singles also available.

the hand dyed fiber is also available, convo me for a custom listing.

please allow 3-5 days for processing. 

email maisiehandspun@live.ie for more details.

name: sparkling colours multi fiber batt OOAK
description:
so many fibers here:
merino, handdyed in so many colours
cotton
tencel
silk
sari silk waste
wool neeps
bamboo
sparkle

will spin beautifully. (i can spin it for you if you like!)

only one batt available, over 2oz.

carded in a smoke-free, pet-free home.

email me at maisiehandspun@live.ie for more details.

name: lemon dreams OOAK handspun art yarn
description:
this began at the balmoral show in belfast, N.I. and came from a desire to go off the proverbial rails as regards handspun yarns....I started with around 100g merino, dyed with lemon and lime KoolAid, then added a little bit of cotton, some silk cocoon, some handdyed silk throwsters waste, some lengths of ribbon and lengths of cotton fabric and then just kept going....I ended up plying it with a 2-ply cotton yarn to keep it a bit more regular. you'll also find the odd button here and there..

bulky to super bulky, 107m, 117yards

the price reflects the length of time it took to tie and then spin in all the pieces of fabric and ribbon and the fiber used.

email me at maisiehandspun@live.ie for further details.

name: oceanic handspun yarn
description:
merino and sari silk waste handdyed by yours truly then carded together then spun into two singles and lovingly plyed = oceanic super gorgeous yarn.

bulky, 4oz/approx 70 yards = enough to knit/ crochet a pair of mitts/a hat or a scarflette.

spun in Ireland!

email maisiehandspun@live.ie for more details.
